text: Lago Colina Dam (Spanish: Presa Lago Colina) is a concrete and earth- embankment gravity dam on the Rio Conchos in Chihuahua, Mexico. The dam forms Lake Colina. Its primary purpose is to divert water for irrigation, and regulate the outflow of the larger La Boquilla Dam upstream. ==See also== *List of dams and reservoirs#Mexico *List of lakes in Mexico Category:Dams in Mexico Category:Gravity dams
title: Lago Colina Dam
